definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="293" y="182"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_random_patch_simple" inline="false"><field name="tries">192</field><field name="xzSpread">5</field><field name="ySpread">8</field><comment pinned="false" h="122" w="245">This block represents a block patch feature. The blocks will only generate in valid positions (for example, grass will never generate on a stone block). Patches of plants should be generated during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:GhostFungus</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being placed.</comment></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"><comment pinned="false" h="72" w="251">This condition is checked for every block that is being placed. Here we don't want the mushrooms to replace other blocks</comment></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">forge:stone</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">-64</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">128</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
